deathtype: Killed by an ANBU black ops operative.
Consumed by a summoning jutsu gone awry.
Caught in a catastrophic explosion from a paper bomb.
Trapped and suffocated within a water prison jutsu.
Impaled by a shadow clone's sharpened kunai.
Turned to ash by Amaterasu's black flames.
Crushed by a massive earth style jutsu.
Lost control and succumbed to their inner beast.
Killed by a puppeteer's poisoned senbon needles.
Caught in a genjutsu and died from mental strain.
Drained of chakra and left to wither by a parasitic technique.
Vaporized by a powerful wind style jutsu.
Struck down by a lightning blade.
Sacrificed in a forbidden summoning ritual.
Eaten whole by a summoned creature.
Killed by Akatsuki members during a capture attempt.
Died from a rare, incurable poison.
Fell victim to a sudden and unexpected landslide.
Killed by a rogue shinobi's surprise attack.
Lost in the forest and succumbed to the elements.
Killed by a wood style technique that pierced their heart.
Trapped within a chakra draining barrier until death.
